title: Display up down down down up down down down

content.description:
A code segment is intended to display the following output.

up down down down up down down down
content.question: Which of the following code segments can be used to display the intended output?

choices.label: The figure presents one block of code that consists of 4 lines. Throughout the block of code there are nested blocks of code, as follows. [Begin Block] Line 1: REPEAT 2 TIMES [Begin Block] Line 2: [begin block] DISPLAY [begin block] “up” [end block] [end block] [Begin Block] Line 3: REPEAT 3 TIMES [Begin Block] [begin block] Line 4: DISPLAY [begin block] “down” [end block] [end block] [End Block] [End Block] [End Block] [End Block]
